entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
